themes.scientific_basis: Based on communication theories, such as assertiveness training and active listening techniques.
themes.description: This theme equips couples with essential communication skills, including how to express needs clearly and listen empathetically to foster mutual understanding.

themes.scientific_basis: Grounded in emotional regulation research and Gottman's work on soothing techniques.
themes.description: This theme helps couples manage emotions during tense situations, teaching strategies to stay calm and navigate challenges without escalation.

themes.scientific_basis: Inspired by conflict resolution strategies, including compromise and problem-solving frameworks.
themes.description: This theme provides tools for resolving disagreements constructively, turning conflicts into opportunities for growth and deeper connection.

themes.scientific_basis: Based on positive psychology and gratitude research in relationships.
themes.description: This theme teaches couples to express appreciation and acknowledge each other's efforts, reinforcing positivity and mutual respect in the relationship.

themes.scientific_basis: Drawn from boundary-setting theories in psychology.
themes.description: This theme helps couples learn how to establish and respect personal boundaries, creating a healthy balance between individuality and togetherness.

themes.scientific_basis: Grounded in research on trust-building and its role in relational satisfaction.
themes.description: This theme focuses on practices that build and maintain trust, ensuring a strong foundation for long-term partnership.

themes.scientific_basis: Inspired by research on collaborative decision-making and shared responsibility in relationships.
themes.description: This theme teaches couples how to make joint decisions effectively, fostering a sense of partnership and equality.

themes.scientific_basis: Based on attachment theory and research on emotional and physical closeness.
themes.description: This theme helps couples explore ways to build emotional and physical intimacy, creating a deeper connection and stronger bond.

themes.scientific_basis: Drawn from research on stress management and co-regulation in couples.
themes.description: This theme teaches couples how to support each other during stressful times, using techniques to manage external pressures as a team.

themes.scientific_basis: Inspired by Carol Dweck's research on growth mindset, applied to relationships.
themes.description: This theme encourages couples to view challenges as opportunities for growth, fostering resilience and adaptability within their relationship.
